per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Defaults to no limit if left blank.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

hide_empty.description: If true, empty terms will not be returned.

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Defaults to no limit if left blank.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.
Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Defaults to no limit if left blank.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to resources created after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

before.description: Limit response to resources created before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

date_column.description: When limiting response using after/before, which date column to compare against.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parent.description: Limit result set to those of particular parent IDs.

parent_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those of a particular parent ID.

type.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings assigned a specific type.

sku.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings with specific SKU(s). Use commas to separate.

featured.description: Limit result set to featured Wallcoverings.

category.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings assigned a specific category ID.

category_operator.description: Operator to compare product category terms.

tag.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings assigned a specific tag ID.

on_sale.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings on sale.

min_price.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings based on a minimum price, provided using the smallest unit of the currency.

max_price.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings based on a maximum price, provided using the smallest unit of the currency.

stock_status.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings with specified stock status.

attributes.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings with selected global attributes.

slug.description: List of attribute slug(s). If a term ID is provided, this will be ignored.

operator.description: Operator to compare product attribute terms.

attribute_relation.description: The logical relationship between attributes when filtering across multiple at once.

catalog_visibility.description: Determines if hidden or visible catalog Wallcoverings are shown.

rating.description: Limit result set to Wallcoverings with a certain average rating.

calculate_price_range.description: If true, calculates the minimum and maximum product prices for the collection.

calculate_attribute_counts.description: If requested, calculates attribute term counts for Wallcoverings in the collection.

query_type.description: Query type being performed which may affect counts. Valid values include "and" and "or".

calculate_rating_counts.description: If true, calculates rating counts for Wallcoverings in the collection.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Defaults to no limit if left blank.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

category_id.description: Limit result set to reviews from specific category IDs.

product_id.description: Limit result set to reviews from specific product IDs.
